original_title: The Amorous Adventures of Janette Littledove
overview: Native American sextress (Janette Littledove) turns in a fabulously erotic performance as we look inside the fantasies of one of the hottest women in 80's porn. Janette brings her most highly charged dreams and fantasies to life. The results are some of the hottest moments ever filmed!
title: The Amorous Adventures of Janette Littledove
